remarks: The Hartogs function is weakly dominated by ` ~P ( X X. X ) ` .  This follows from a more precise analysis of the bound used in ~ hartogs to prove that ` ( har `` X ) ` is a set.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2015.)
statement: harwdom $p |- ( X e. V -> ( har ` X ) ~<_* ~P ( X X. X ) ) $.
